bug.author: fpmchu
bug.summary: Tensorflow API doc image is wrong for tf.scatter_*
bug.description: In tf.scatter_{add,sub,update}, the image has indices = [0, 2, 5], but the arrow suggest it's actually [2, 0, 5]. We can't help fix it though since the images in the dos are not part of git. <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#scatter_update>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#scatter_update</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I believe this was fixed, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/colah>@colah</denchmark-link> can you confirm and close?
